Room_Description: [ta - Tamil] Ahoy there, mateys!  A breath-taking step into Captain Red Brick and his first mate’s pirate cabin. Your whole ship will be decked out with pirate bedding, curtains, wallpaper and even Polly, a LEGO parrot, can be found watching over you as you sleep! After a jolly adventure on the rides in the Park, send your junior shipmates up to their private bunks while you relax in the king-size cabin. So, me hearties, book your pirate room today for an unforgettable family treat. Shiver me timbers!

[ta - Tamil] Welcome young Ninja!  Step into the temple courtyard, the cliff top overlooks all of NINJAGO as far as you can see. The bed lies at the bottom of a large shrine that holds all four of the epic elemental weapons. After a day in the Park, send your little Ninjas to their own private Dragon Cave while you relax in your king-sized bed.  Ninja alike will love exploring the different powers of each Ninja… Which power will you choose?

*The above picture of the room may be different from the actual one.

[ta - Tamil] The LEGO Friends have invited you to the ultimate sleepover in their Clubhouse!
After you and your friends spend the day in the park, stay the night in Heartlake City where you can discover your talents in the heart of the awesome Creative clubhouse with all the LEGO Friends!
With a Kingsize bed for parents and a private bunk bed for the kids, it is sure to be a sleep over your family will never forget!

*The above picture of the room may be different from the actual one.
